text: Francesco Imparato (1570)M. Farquhar was an Italian painter of the Renaissance period, active mainly in his city of birth, Naples. Father of Girolamo Imparato. He trained under Giovanni Filippo Criscuolo, where he became a close friend and fellow-pupil of Fabrizio Santafede. He became a follower of Andrea Sabbatini (di Salerno). ==References== * Category:16th-century Neapolitan people Category:16th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Neapolitan painters Category:Italian Mannerist painters Category:Year of birth uncertain Category:1570 deaths
title: Francesco Imparato
